oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Camel Rock & Roll Dance Party - 1956-09-18 - Part 1 [transfer 1]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: CBS Rock 'N' Roll Dance Party program sponsored by Camel cigarettes, 1956-09-18 part 1. Hosted by Alan Freed with announcer Bern Bennett, starring Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and his orchestra, and featuring Frankie Lymon and the Teenagers, Danny Overbea, and LaVern Baker. Produced and directed by Lou Melamed.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Big Al Sears; Sam "The Man" Taylor; LaVern Baker; Danny Overbea
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Station announcements -- Opening theme -- Opening statement (Alan Freed) -- Opening statement (Bern Bennett) -- Alan Freed introduces Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and the orchestra -- Teener's Canteen (Big Al Sears tenor saxophone, Sam ""The Man"" Taylor and orchestra) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Camel Cigarettes jingle -- Alan Freed introduces LaVern Baker -- Get Up Get Up (You Sleepy Head) (LaVern Baker) -- Alan Freed introduces LaVern Baker -- My Happiness Forever (LaVern Baker) -- Camel Cigarettes commercial (Alan Freed) -- Alan Freed introduces Danny Overbea -- Hey Pancho (Danny Overbea)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: CBS Inc.; WCBS (Radio station : New York, N.Y.); R.J. Reynolds Tobacco Company; Camel rock 'n roll dance party (Radio program); Freed, Alan; Bennett, Bern, 1921-2014; Taylor, Sam; Sears, Al, 1910-1990; Lymon, Frankie; Teenagers (Musical group); Overbea, Danny; Baker, LaVern; Melamed, Louis
